name: Hindsight (V)
Lore: '''I''m backwards! You fleabitten furball...only an overgrown mophead like you would be stupid enough--''',
Text: 'Unless Imperial Atrocity on table, if you are about to lose Force during opponent''s control phase, deploy on table to reduce loss by 6 (ignore other modifiers); opponent may take into hand any one card from reserve deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Control]. OR Use 2 Force to deploy on table and stack one just-played Interrupt here.',
